duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a 3-day leadership program focused on professional services, team building, and career exploration.
Complete more than one internship to develop technical skills and core leadership competencies.
Self-identification as a member of a racial minority group is required.
Work in a team-oriented environment and demonstrate creativity, flexibility, and adaptability.
Maintain academic success with a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0.
May require work hours exceeding the standard 40-hour work week and occasional national and international travel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or a related field (Master's preferred)
